"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "patient", "label": "Patient"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "options": "I am being provided with this information and consent form so I may better understand the treatment recommended for me. Before beginning, I wish to be provided with enough information, in a way I can understand, to make a well- informed decision regarding my proposed treatment.

I understand that I may ask any questions I wish, and that it is better to ask them before treatment begins than to wonder about it after treatment has started.

", "fieldname": "_custom_html", "fieldtype": "HTML", "label": "Custom HTML"}, {"print_hide": 0, "options": "Nature of the Recommended Treatment

It has been recommended that I have the following periodontal treatment (all that apply have been checked for me):

", "fieldname": "_custom_html", "fieldtype": "HTML", "label": "Custom HTML"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "scaling_and_root_planing", "label": "Scaling and root planing"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "gingivectomy", "label": "Gingivectomy (recontouring)"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "other_perio", "label": "Other Perio"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "osseous__surgery_and_recontouring", "label": "Osseous (bone) surgery and recontouring"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "periodontal_bone_graft", "label": "Periodontal bone graft"}, {"print_hide": 0, "fieldname": "referral_to_a_gum_specialist", "label": "Referral to a gum specialist (periodontist)"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "options": "Teeth or areas of each recommended treatment:{{doc.teeth_area_of_treatment}}
This recommendation is based on visual examination, periodontal probing and charting, X-rays, other diagnostic tests, any models or photos taken, and on my doctor's knowledge of my medical and dental history. The treatment is necessary because of periodontal (gum) disease that has been diagnosed as:

I have been informed that other factors can affect my periodontal disease and its progression, including the condition of my dental restorations, certain diseases (such as diabetes and heart disease), habits (tobacco use), and medications.
Factors specifically affecting me include: The intended benefit of this treatment is to improve the health of my gums and teeth and to try to retain my natural teeth as long as possible. Other benefits may include: _ The prognosis , or likelihood of success, of this treatment is: _
My treatment is estimated to take visits to complete, and is estimated to cost
Rs.

", "fieldname": "_custom_html", "fieldtype": "HTML", "label": "Custom HTML"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "options": "Alternative Treatments

The treatment recommended for me was chosen because it is believed to best suit my needs. I understand that alternative ways to treat my periodontal dental condition include:
